SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(MAX(t.created_time),'%Y-%m-%d') as "createdtime" , t.progress as "progress", DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') as "currentData" FROM tb_plan_project_d t WHERE t.record_status = 1 AND t.project_no=#{projectno} GROUP BY t.created_time

SELECT t.task_name as "taskname", CONCAT(ROUND(t.nowadays_progress * 1,0),"%") as "nowadaysprogress", CASE WHEN(t.task_state=1) THEN '延期' WHEN(t.task_state=2) THEN '正常' WHEN(t.task_state=3) THEN '提前' ELSE '未到期' END AS "taskstate",
t.expect_differ_time as "expectdiffertime", CASE WHEN(t.appraise=1) THEN '赞' WHEN(t.appraise=2) THEN '倒' WHEN(t.appraise=3) THEN '快' WHEN(t.appraise=4) THEN '预警' WHEN(t.appraise=5) THEN '慢' WHEN(t.appraise=6) THEN '正常' ELSE '无' END AS "appraise", IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(t.plan_start_time,'%Y/%m/%d'),'') as "planstarttime", IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(t.plan_stop_time,'%Y/%m/%d'),'') as "planstoptime", DATE_FORMAT(t.actual_begin_time,'%Y/%m/%d') as "actualbegintime", DATE_FORMAT(t.actual_end_time,'%Y/%m/%d') as "actualendtime" FROM tb_plan_project_task t WHERE t.record_status =1 AND t.project_number=#{projectNo} ORDER BY t.task_name

SELECT CONCAT(ROUND(sum(1))) as "total", CONCAT(ROUND(sum( CASE WHEN t.nowadays_progress = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/sum(1) * 100),"%") as "nostart", CONCAT(ROUND(sum( CASE WHEN t.nowadays_progress = 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/sum(1) * 100),"%") as "complete", CONCAT(ROUND(sum( CASE WHEN (t.nowadays_progress > 0 && t.nowadays_progress < 100) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/sum(1) * 100),"%") as "uncomplete" FROM tb_plan_project_task t WHERE t.record_status = 1 AND t.project_number=#{projectNo}
